features.featureTitle: Create a new standalone route/page for the Industries We Serve page and render the full publish-ready content provided by the user using the following section structure in order: (1) Hero section with headline, subheadline, supporting line, and CTA "Request Founder Blueprint"; (2) "Our Focus" section describing the target business profile and explicitly stating you do not serve early-stage startups; (3) Four industry blocks (Manufacturing SMEs, Distributors & Trading Companies, Professional Service Firms, Second-Generation Leadership Teams) where each block includes three clearly labeled subparts: "Common Challenges", "What We Implement", and "Outcome"; (4) "What stays consistent across industries" section with the provided bullet points and closing lines; (5) "Is This Right for You?" qualifying statement section with fit/not-fit messaging; (6) Lead generation section with headline, subheadline, and form; (7) Final CTA block with headline and "Book Strategy Call" button; and (8) a short "Caffeine AI prompt" block at the end (as requested by the user) presented as copyable text.

Add site navigation linking to the new Industries We Serve page: update the top navigation so that "Industries" navigates to the new Industries page route (not the homepage #industries anchor), while keeping existing routing behavior for other links (e.g., CONTROLâ„¢).

Implement lead capture integration on the Industries page by adding a lead-generation form in the Lead Generation section with these fields: First Name, Last Name, Company Name, Industry (Dropdown), Revenue Range, Biggest Operational Bottleneck, Work Email, Mobile Number; and a submit CTA labeled "Request Industry Blueprint". On submit, persist the lead using the existing frontend submission hook and backend addLead API, packaging the additional fields into the lead message payload similarly to the existing Control lead form pattern.

Wire the Industries page CTAs to the appropriate on-page actions: (a) the Hero CTA "Request Founder Blueprint" should scroll the user to the Industries page lead-generation form section; (b) the Final CTA "Book Strategy Call" should trigger the same strategy call action used elsewhere in the app.
